languages.text: The user gains +20 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the user suffers −20 to Willpower until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Персонаж получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. После прекращения действия эффекта его Воля уменьшается на 20 до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: The user gains +20 to Intelligence and Willpower for 2 rounds. After that the user suffers −20 to Willpower until the end of combat.

The user gains +20 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the user suffers −20 to Willpower until the end of combat.

languages.text: Персонаж получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. После прекращения действия эффекта его Воля уменьшается на 20 до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает +2 к Интеллекту и Воле на 2 раунда. После прекращения действия эффекта его Воля уменьшается на 20 до конца боя.
Персонаж получает +2 к Интеллекту и Воле на 2 раунда. После прекращения действия эффекта его Воля уменьшается на 20 до конца боя.

languages.text: 使用者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高20点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。效果结束后，使用者的意志降低20点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: The user gains +20 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the user suffers −20 to Willpower until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 使用者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高20点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。效果结束后，使用者的意志降低20点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: 2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}+20その後、戦闘終了時まで意志力−20
languages.original_text: The user gains +20 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the user suffers −20 to Willpower until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}+20その後、戦闘終了時まで意志力−20

languages.text: El usuario obtiene +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rondas{/g}. A continuación, pierde −20 de Voluntad hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: The user gains +20 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the user suffers −20 to Willpower until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: El usuario obtiene +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rondas{/g}. A continuación, pierde −20 de Voluntad hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Der Nutzer erlangt +20 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, und zwar für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}. Danach erleidet der Nutzer bis zum Ende des Kampfes −20 auf Willenskraft.
languages.original_text: The user gains +20 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the user suffers −20 to Willpower until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Der Nutzer erlangt +20 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, und zwar für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}. Danach erleidet der Nutzer bis zum Ende des Kampfes −20 auf Willenskraft.

languages.text: L'utilisateur bénéficie de +20 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, après quoi il subit −20 de Force Mentale jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: The user gains +20 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the user suffers −20 to Willpower until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur bénéficie de +20 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, après quoi il subit -20 de Volonté jusqu'à la fin du combat.
